attributes.action: agree to the creaton of a Independent Yorkshire Republic
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Yorkshire; a dynamic & resourceful nation held back by the rest of the UK, subsidising underachieving counties. We propose Yorkshire to become a fully independent state within the EU & recognised by the UN. Principals of Law, Democracy & Equality, represented in our Peoples Constitution (YPC). Capital - York, home to the government directly elected by the citizens; will oversee governance, with Referendum on all key issues. Low beaurocracy , thus an efficient & responsive administration. Market Leading Financial & Service Industries, Energy production, North Sea Oil, Gas & Coal, connected with the UK, EU and World through World Class Transportation, including International Airports, Ports, High Speed Rail & Road networks. Proper Investment  into Alternative Transport; such as Maglev, would enable Super High Speed transport. Not forgetting Latest Technologies with Renowned Educational Institutions & Hyper Modern Research & Development Teams. 
Yorkshire+Peoples Constitution=MORE POWER
